tool.name: MetaboLights Downloader
tool.description: Download public and private MetaboLights studies

param.name: file_path
param.label: Study path at MetaboLights FTP Server
param.help: This should be obtained from the MetaboLights website. For public studies, for MTBLS253 would be: /studies/public/MTBLS253

param.name: aspera_password
param.label: Password for download
param.help: For public studies, leave the password blank, the default will be used.

tool.help: **Overview** A program to download complete MetaboLights studies.
